issue.title: GUI test failures on homebrew after upgrade to qt 5.10.0

content.raw:
We have switched to using 10.12 for our homebrew CI, so there are fewer qt test failures:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-homebrew-amd64/76/testReport/

I'll post some backtraces when I have a chance.

If there are too many test failures due to qt 5.10, we can consider depending on older versions like [qt@5.5](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/blob/master/Formula/qt@5.5.rb) or [qt@5.7](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/blob/master/Formula/qt@5.7.rb), but then we would have to build our own bottles of [qwt](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/blob/master/Formula/qwt.rb).
content.html:
We have switched to using 10.12 for our homebrew CI, so there are fewer qt test failures:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-homebrew-amd64/76/testReport/

I'll post some backtraces when I have a chance.

If there are too many test failures due to qt 5.10, we can consider depending on older versions like qt@5.5 or qt@5.7, but then we would have to build our own bottles of qwt.
